name: 1.5.0-M3
body:

## :lady_beetle: Bug Fixes

- Access to identifier property not guarded properly [#711](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-data-r2dbc/issues/711)
## :hammer: Dependency Upgrades

- Upgrade to Postgres driver 42.3.3 [#721](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-data-r2dbc/pull/721)
- Upgrade to netty 4.1.73.Final [#717](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-data-r2dbc/issues/717)
- Upgrade postgresql to 42.2.25 [#716](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-data-r2dbc/pull/716)
- Upgrade to R2DBC Spec 0.9 (Borca release train) [#710](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-data-r2dbc/issues/710)

## :heart: Contributors

We'd like to thank all the contributors who worked on this release!

- [@dependabot[bot]](https://github.com/apps/dependabot)

## :notebook_with_decorative_cover: Documentation

- Clarify that `@Modifying` should be omitted for `DELETE FROM ... RETURNING ...` `@Query`'s [#629](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-data-r2dbc/issues/629)

## :green_book: Links
* [Spring Data R2DBC 1.2.12 Reference documentation](https://docs.spring.io/spring-data/r2dbc/docs/1.2.12/reference/html/)

name: 1.4.0-M1
body:
## :green_book: Links
* [Spring Data R2DBC 1.4.0-M1 Reference documentation](https://docs.spring.io/spring-data/r2dbc/docs/1.4.0-M1/reference/html/)
* [Spring Data R2DBC 1.4.0-M1 Javadoc](https://docs.spring.io/spring-data/r2dbc/docs/1.4.0-M1/api/)

## :star: New Features

- Introduce `OutboundRow.clone()` method [#620](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-data-r2dbc/issues/620)
## :beetle: Bug Fixes

- Dynamic projection skipped if projection type not already registered with MappingContext [#607](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-data-r2dbc/issues/607)
- Saving Enum-typed Collection-like properties set to `null` are not translated to `String[]` [#593](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-data-r2dbc/issues/593)
- Entity callbacks not fired for String-based queries or named query methods [#591](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-data-r2dbc/issues/591)
- MySQL dialect converts all `byte` properties to `boolean` [#589](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-data-r2dbc/issues/589)
- `PreparedOperationBindableQuery.bindNull(…)` calls `GenericExecuteSpec.bind(…)` instead of `bindNull(…)` [#587](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-data-r2dbc/pull/587)
- Custom converter for constructor creation no longer applied [#585](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-data-r2dbc/issues/585)
- Spring R2DBC should support camel case columns in Postgresql out of the box or should provide configuration for supporting it.  [#483](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-data-r2dbc/issues/483)
## :notebook_with_decorative_cover: Documentation

- Document default `NamingStrategy` and explain configuration options [#616](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-data-r2dbc/issues/616)
## :hammer: Dependency Upgrades

- Upgrade to R2DBC Arabba SR10 [#597](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-data-r2dbc/issues/597)
- Upgrade to MySQL 8.0 for testing [#594](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-data-r2dbc/issues/594)

## :heart: Contributors

We'd like to thank all the contributors who worked on this release!

- [@Grayswan4](https://github.com/Grayswan4)

## :green_book: Links
* [Spring Data R2DBC 1.3.3 Reference documentation](https://docs.spring.io/spring-data/r2dbc/docs/1.3.3/reference/html/)
* [Spring Data R2DBC 1.3.3 Javadoc](https://docs.spring.io/spring-data/r2dbc/docs/1.3.3/api/)

## :notebook_with_decorative_cover: Documentation

- Document default `NamingStrategy` and explain configuration options [#616](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-data-r2dbc/issues/616)

## :notebook_with_decorative_cover: Documentation

- Document default `NamingStrategy` and explain configuration options [#616](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-data-r2dbc/issues/616)

## :green_book: Links
* [Spring Data R2DBC 1.3.2 Reference documentation](https://docs.spring.io/spring-data/r2dbc/docs/1.3.2/reference/html/)
* [Spring Data R2DBC 1.3.2 Javadoc](https://docs.spring.io/spring-data/r2dbc/docs/1.3.2/api/)

## :beetle: Bug Fixes

- Dynamic projection skipped if projection type not already registered with MappingContext [#607](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-data-r2dbc/issues/607)
- MySQL dialect converts all `byte` properties to `boolean` [#589](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-data-r2dbc/issues/589)
- Spring R2DBC should support camel case columns in Postgresql out of the box or should provide configuration for supporting it.  [#483](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-data-r2dbc/issues/483)

## :green_book: Links
* [Spring Data R2DBC 1.2.10 Reference documentation](https://docs.spring.io/spring-data/r2dbc/docs/1.2.10/reference/html/)
* [Spring Data R2DBC 1.2.10 Javadoc](https://docs.spring.io/spring-data/r2dbc/docs/1.2.10/api/)

## :beetle: Bug Fixes

- Dynamic projection skipped if projection type not already registered with MappingContext [#607](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-data-r2dbc/issues/607)
- MySQL dialect converts all `byte` properties to `boolean` [#589](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-data-r2dbc/issues/589)
- Spring R2DBC should support camel case columns in Postgresql out of the box or should provide configuration for supporting it.  [#483](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-data-r2dbc/issues/483)

## :green_book: Links
* [Spring Data R2DBC 1.3.1 Reference documentation](https://docs.spring.io/spring-data/r2dbc/docs/1.3.1/reference/html/)
* [Spring Data R2DBC 1.3.1 Javadoc](https://docs.spring.io/spring-data/r2dbc/docs/1.3.1/api/)

## :beetle: Bug Fixes

- Saving Enum-typed Collection-like properties set to `null` are not translated to `String[]` [#593](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-data-r2dbc/issues/593)
- `PreparedOperationBindableQuery.bindNull(…)` calls `GenericExecuteSpec.bind(…)` instead of `bindNull(…)` [#587](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-data-r2dbc/pull/587)
- Custom converter for constructor creation no longer applied [#585](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-data-r2dbc/issues/585)
## :hammer: Dependency Upgrades

- Upgrade to R2DBC Arabba SR10 [#597](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-data-r2dbc/issues/597)
- Upgrade to MySQL 8.0 for testing [#594](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-data-r2dbc/issues/594)

name: 1.3.0-M5
body:
## :green_book: Links
* [Spring Data R2DBC 1.3.0-M5 Reference documentation](https://docs.spring.io/spring-data/r2dbc/docs/1.3.0-M5/reference/html/)
* [Spring Data R2DBC 1.3.0-M5 Javadoc](https://docs.spring.io/spring-data/r2dbc/docs/1.3.0-M5/api/)

## :star: New Features

- Consider calling Statement.returnGeneratedValues() using the primary key column name [#558](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-data-r2dbc/issues/558)
- Implement QueryByExample [#532](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-data-r2dbc/issues/532)
- Oracle with R2DBC [#230](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-data-r2dbc/issues/230)
## :beetle: Bug Fixes

- Default ID value on new record is inserted when optimistic locking is enabled [#557](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-data-r2dbc/issues/557)
- R2dbcEntityTemplate.insert(…) doesn't propagate error signals after data signal  [#552](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-data-r2dbc/issues/552)
## :notebook_with_decorative_cover: Documentation

- Remove .RELEASE suffix from version number in documentation [#546](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-data-r2dbc/pull/546)
## :hammer: Dependency Upgrades

- Upgrade to Arabba SR9 [#548](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-data-r2dbc/issues/548)

We'd like to thank all the contributors who worked on this release!

- [@dzou](https://github.com/dzou)
